tweet: After watching this, I realized that Cardano's slot leader selection algorithm uses the follow-the-satoshi algorithm that I invented in 2012!  https://t.co/Y9VDM3g3s8 @IOHK_Charles @IMOK_Charles   Oh, Tezos also. Who else uses the follow-the-satoshi/follow-the-coin algo?

Find out what the IOHK team accomplished this week by reading their Weekly Cardano Technical Report. Progress in workstreams such as Daedalus and the wallet backend are shared:   https://t.co/ghjk9gRKLZ

Last month, the inaugural Netherlands Cardano community meetup was held in Rotterdam. At the event, Bernardo David, IOHK's research fellow, spoke about Ouroboros, the proof-of-stake algorithm of Cardano. Watch his presentation here:   https://t.co/tqH5LqU3lI

It is with much regret that the mainnet release for our light wallet "Yoroi" will be delayed to Q4 and the launch of testnet will be delayed to the middle of September. We are deeply sorry for any inconvenience. #iohk #EMURGO #Cardano #ADA @InputOutputHK @CardanoStiftung

In this video, Bernardo David presented to the audience about Ouroboros, the main consensus protocol used in Cardano at the Rotterdam Cardano meetup in July:  https://t.co/TiA3bgv7OJ @cardano #cardanocommunity #blockchain

We heard you and we are eager to launch Yoroi as soon as possible. Currently, we are waiting on a necessary update to the Testnet and the Cardano Rust library. We are ready to launch as soon as possible once this happens. Sorry about the delay and thank you for reaching us.
